RegisterRequestDTO - Class in com.g1.mychess.auth.dto
Data Transfer Object representing the details required for user registration, including username, password, email, and other personal information.

registerUser(RegisterRequestDTO) - Method in interface com.g1.mychess.auth.service.AuthService
Registers a new user with the provided registration details.
registerUser(RegisterRequestDTO) - Method in class com.g1.mychess.auth.service.impl.AuthServiceImpl
Registers a new user by validating the registration data, creating the user in the player service, generating a verification token, and sending an email verification link.

resendVerificationEmail(String) - Method in interface com.g1.mychess.auth.service.AuthService

resendVerificationEmail(String) - Method in class com.g1.mychess.auth.service.impl.AuthServiceImpl
Resends the email verification link if the user's email is not already verified.
